The administration of biologicals was managed as follows. Omalizuamb and benralizumab were self-administered at home. AÂ service for drug home delivery was activated. Conversely, patients not able to self-administrate the drug came to the center. Mepolizumab was diluted and administered by the attending physician on site. When patients lived far from our center, the Severe Asthma Network in Italy
2 was used to identify a local near-home center for in-site administration.
